summary: In this documentary, veteran filmmaker Harry Moses exposes the controversy in the world of high priced artwork. He paints a vivid picture of how art is bought and sold in America.
cast: Teri Horton|Tod M. Volpe|Ben Heller|Nick Carone|John Myatt|Peter Paul Biro|Thomas Hoving|Jeffrey Bergen|Joseph D. Beam|Judy Hill|Teri Paquin|Bill Page|Ron Spencer|Allan Stone|Adrienne Wilde
keywords: question in title|censored profanity in title
director: Director: Harry Morgan Moses (as Harry Moses)
title: Who the #$&% Is Jackson Pollock?
